titles.title: A resolution to authorize the reprinting of the manuscript entitled "Creation of the Senate", prepared by Dr. George J. Schulz in 1937.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/12/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the reprinting as a Senate document of the manuscript entitled "Creation of the Senate," prepared by Dr. George J. Schulz, Director of the Legislative Reference Service, Library of Congress, and originally ordered printed in the 75th Congress in 1937.
